sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1284052_consol_0.GetUserCompany</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>return the user company </description><name>GetUserCompany</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserCompany = Class.create();
GetUserCompany.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getCompany: function() {
		var userId = gs.getUserID();
		var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		
		if (userGR.getValue('company')) {
			return userGR.getValue('company');
		}
		return '';
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rolando.garza</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-27 04:22:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>b7d105ad938f0210d59d385efaba1039</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserCompany</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System" source="x_1284052_consol_0">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b7d105ad938f0210d59d385efaba1039</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rolando.garza</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-27 04:22:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
